mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM rgdb."DbT5221NinteichosaSchedule" AS DbT5221 WHERE DbT5221."ninteiChosaYoteiYMD" = #{認定調査予定年月日} AND DbT5221."chosaChikuCode" = #{調査地区コード} AND DbT5221."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" = #{認定調査委託先コード} AND DbT5221."ninteiChosainCode" = #{認定調査員コード} AND DbT5221."shichosonCode" = #{市町村コード}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM rgdb."DbT5221NinteichosaSchedule" AS DbT5221 WHERE DbT5221."ninteiChosaYoteiYMD" = #{認定調査予定年月日} AND DbT5221."chosaChikuCode" = #{調査地区コード} AND DbT5221."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" = #{認定調査委託先コード} AND DbT5221."ninteiChosainCode" = #{認定調査員コード} AND DbT5221."shichosonCode" = #{市町村コード}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rgdb."DbT5221NinteichosaSchedule" AS DbT5221( DbT5221."ninteiChosaYoteiYMD", DbT5221."ninteiChosaYoteiKaishiTime", DbT5221."ninteiChosaYoteiShuryoTime", DbT5221."ninteiChosaJikanWaku", DbT5221."chosaChikuCode", DbT5221."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode", DbT5221."ninteiChosainCode", DbT5221."shichosonCode", DbT5221."shinseishoKanriNo", DbT5221."yoyakuJokyo", DbT5221."yoyakuKaoFlag", DbT5221."biko", DbT5221."basho", DbT5221."chushajo", DbT5221."tachiainin1", DbT5221."renrakusaki1", DbT5221."tachiainin2", DbT5221."renrakusaki2", DbT5221."taishoshaMemo") VALUES( #{認定調査予定年月日}, #{認定調査予定開始時間}, #{認定調査予定終了時間}, #{認定調査時間枠}, #{調査地区コード}, #{認定調査委託先コード}, #{認定調査員コード}, #{市町村コード}, #{" "}, #{0}, #{0}, #{" "}, #{" "}, #{" "}, #{" "}, #{" "}, #{" "}, #{" "}, #{" "})
